entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Emit a warning when insufficient compiler version is used with the SDK #30304
  • Add a new item template for launchSettings.json #30302
  • [Questions] How to know the latest installed dotnet sdk version on a non sdk style project file like .vcxproj #30289

Closed

  • dotnet add command incorrect behaviour #30286
  • We need a workload team/alias #30176
  • [NETSDKE2E]With .NET 8 SDK installed, the default publish path is "/bin/Release/..." not "/bin/Debug/..." when running "dotnet publish" in CLI #30245
  • Unable to publish two Blazor projects in a solution #30092

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'main' #30306
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix dotnet new -v displaying exception callstack #30292
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Warn if the publish profile provided is not present in the project #30239
    Area-WebSDK
  • Fix bug with `dotnet publish -p:Foo` #30265
    Area-NetSDK
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'main' #30280
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #30273
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Add tracking of the nuget cache to see how many files we downloaded during the test run. #29264
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update README.md #30085
    Area-WebSDK
  • Generate a call of a base class constructor if the default constructor does not exist. #30264
    Area-GenAPI
  • Add Visual Basic module template #30139
  • Refactor allowEmptyTelemetry to use Items and support hashing #30269
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add a PostAction to support modifying Json files in CLI templates #29880
    Area-dotnet new
  • Fix up 'CurrentTargetFramework' usage error #30212
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [WIP] Workload Clean #30266
    Area-Infrastructure
